document.full_text: real detectives, like the ones investigating the arrest of dominique strauss-kahn on sexual assault charges, do not solve cases in the span of an hourlong television show.
document.title: sex-assault case puts focus on police unit, not quite as seen on tv
lines_and_colors: real detectives, like the ones investigating the arrest of dominique strauss-kahn on sexual assault charges, do not solve cases in the span of an hourlong television show.
